name: Lucas Grant
summary: M.Sc. Engineering Mathematics student with a passion for applied mathematics, machine learning, game development, and technology. Experience in business development, software engineering, event coordination, and DevOps through academic projects, student organizations, and industry internships.

notables: Program Emphasis: Applied Mathematics, Computer Science, and Numerical Analysis.
FDEV: Active member of student group collaborating on programming projects.
KTH AI Society: Business Development Representative at KTH AI Society, organising and attending events such as hackathons, lectures and workshops on AI.
Graduation Paper: "Probability in a Basic Quantum Computer"
Extracurricular: Lead Organizer of Class Graduation
